main event: Multiple sightings of luminous objects over Morocco, particularly in Casablanca, Tangier, and Fes, during 22-23 September 1952.
interesting points: The sightings included a luminous disk resembling the sun seen from 17 kilometers away south of Tangier., A pilot observed a flying saucer at 50 meters during landing in Casablanca., Thousands of spectators witnessed the saucer during a boxing match in Casablanca., The object was variously described as a cone-shaped object trailing green smoke and an orange-colored ball of fire., Some reports attributed sightings to meteorological phenomena, yet many observers insisted they were man-made objects.
sighted object: luminous disk-shaped saucer, orange-colored ball of fire, cone-shaped object
witness description: spectators at a boxing match, pilots, and ground personnel
